data.persona: I came into the village to tell the men there that I knew where the wolves were sleeping and where their pups are, I offered to take them there and help end the menace in exchange for most of the pelts. The wolfskins will sell well in the town nearby. I'll make a pretty penny.
data.description:
You are in the Gallery.
The cave is pitch black and smells of dank and mold. It's quiet except for a faint dripping noise from water overhead and the occasionally scurrying of an unseen rodent through the darkness. Barely discernable by the light of a torch is a small pile of bones in one corner. From what type of animal they are from is unclear.
The the bartender is here.

You are carrying a pouch and a fur, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to res my back.
data.mid_motivation: I have to be rested to be able to walk to the next town.
data.long_motivation: I want to go back to my hometown.
